actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish the same income tax schedule for individuals filing as heads of households as married individuals filing jointly.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make the income tax rate schedule for heads of households the same as that for married individuals filing joint returns.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish the same income tax schedule for individuals filing as heads of households as married individuals filing jointly.
